title: Leo
detail: I'm currently working on a robot vacuum.

title: Media Query Bookmarklet
detail: The mediaQuery bookmarklet gives a visual representation of the current viewport dimensions and most recently fired media query.

title: mediaCheck
detail: This is a simple wrapper around matchMedia to run code on entry and exit from media queries. It also uses browser resize as a fallback for browsers that don't support matchMedia.

title: Gem City JS
detail: Gem City JS is a meetup of web developers who share a desire to share and learn more about JavaScript.
